verses.name: 2 Samuel 3:1
verses.text: Now there was long war between the house of Saul and the house of David: but David waxed stronger and stronger, and the house of Saul waxed weaker and weaker.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 3:2
verses.text: And unto David were sons born in Hebron: and his firstborn was Amnon, of Ahinoam the Jezreelitess;

verses.name: 2 Samuel 3:3
verses.text: And his second, Chileab, of Abigail the wife of Nabal the Carmelite; and the third, Absalom the son of Maacah the daughter of Talmai king of Geshur;

verses.name: 2 Samuel 3:4
verses.text: And the fourth, Adonijah the son of Haggith; and the fifth, Shephatiah the son of Abital;
